chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Type
X: Type
c: (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y
lc: X -> nat
Hc: forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x
P: (nat * list X)%type
err: nat
i: nat
ll: list X
x: X
mm: list X

Goal:
snd P = ll ++ x :: mm -> linker (length ll + fst P) = lsum ll + i

Premises:
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type
Notation lsum := length_compiler
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type
linker = let ll := (length (snd P) + fst P, lsum (snd P) + i) :: link (fst P) (snd P) i in fun j : nat => match list_assoc Nat.eq_dec j ll with | Some p => p | None => err end : nat -> nat Arguments linker _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]

Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?TX : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X ->...-> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]

out_code : nat -> code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]

EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
subcode : code ?X -> nat * list ?X -> Prop where ?X : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
EnvRing.PEsub : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i : nat err : nat ll : list X x : X mm : list X |- Type]
linker_app : forall ll mm : list X, snd P = ll ++ mm -> linker (length ll + fst P) = lsum ll + i
link = fix link (i : nat) (ll : list X) (j : nat) {struct ll} : list (nat * nat) := match ll with | nil => nil | x :: ll0 => (i, j) :: link (S i) ll0 (lc x + j) end : nat -> list X -> nat -> list (nat * nat) Arguments link _%nat_scope _%list_scope _%nat_scope
comp = fun lnk : nat -> nat => fix comp (i : nat) (ll : list X) (j : nat) {struct ll} : list Y := match ll with | nil => nil | x :: ll0 => c lnk i x ++ comp (S i) ll0 (lc x + j) end : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> list X -> nat -> list Y Arguments comp _%function_scope _%nat_scope _%list_scope _%nat_scope
comp_app : forall (lnk : nat -> nat) (i : nat) (ll mm : list X) (j : nat), comp lnk i (ll ++ mm) j = comp lnk i ll j ++ comp lnk (length ll + i) mm (lsum ll + j)
compiler_subcode : forall (j : nat) (x : X), (j, x :: nil) <sc P -> (linker j, c linker j x) <sc (i, compiler) /\ linker (1 + j) = lc x + linker j

```coq
intros.
rewrite H.
simpl.
rewrite Hc.
unfold linker.
rewrite comp_app.
simpl.
rewrite Hc.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros. rewrite H. simpl. rewrite Hc. unfold linker. rewrite comp_app. simpl. rewrite Hc. auto.
